original_text: When he arrived, there was Eli sitting on his chair by the side of the road, watching, because his heart feared for the ark of God. When the man entered the town and told what had happened, the whole town sent up a cry.
korean_text: 그가 이를 때는 엘리가 길 옆 자기의 의자에 앉아 기다리며 그의 마음이 하나님의 궤로 말미암아 떨릴 즈음이라 그 사람이 성읍에 들어오며 알리매 온 성읍이 부르짖는지라

sentences.original_text: there was Eli sitting on his chair
by the side of the road
because his heart feared for the ark of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 마음이 하나님의 언약궤를 두려워했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: When the man entered the town
the whole town sent up a cry
